What is a design system?

In one line: A design system is a guidelines/patterns/style guide for the products that we develop in the frontend, mobile apps ordesktop apps etc.

Examples for design systems are:
  • Baseweb Design
  • Atlassian Design
  • Cosmos

Today, we will be talking about how to get started with design systems in ReactJS using Create React App and StorybooksJS. StorybooksJS indeed supports different frontend frameworks like VueJS, Ember, Angular, Svelte etc
